title: Gordon Ramsay's son looks exactly like his father after fresh new trim
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Gordon Ramsay’s baby boy is looking more and more like his father after his fresh trim.

The Chef must have the world’s strongest genes because his entire family are spitting images of him.

Gordon uploaded an adorable photo of his baby son Oscar – who is only six months old – and we can’t get over how cool of a tiny doppelganger he is.

He captioned the photo: ‘Haircuts Done ! Ready to start the week ! @oscarjramsay@mellissabrown @tanaramsay’

Fans first noticed that baby Oscar had inherited the chef’s famous scowl after he showcased his angry face during his first hair cut a month ago.

Advertisement

We can’t wait until Oscar is in his uniform and yelling at every chef in town.

The Hell’s Kitchen star also uploaded a few clips of his 17-year-old daughter Matilda attempting to feed the little one but Oscar just wasn’t having it.

Neither would we if we were being fed what looks like mushy peas, to be honest.

Oscar is already super photogenic (Picture: @gordongram)

Same, Oscar, same (Picture: @gordongram)

Maybe it’s too raw, Gordon.

At the same time, it looks like Tilly is having the time of her life hanging out with her new baby brother.

Fans also couldn’t get over how cute the Ramsay’s are.

One fan commented: ‘Split pea face for dinner. Too cute Oscar,’ along with a laughing cat emoji.

‘So sweet and he just keeps on eating, even though it looks like he hates it. ..lol . Yes, next time let dad cook,’ another commented along with a few love hearts.

Gordon and his wife Tana married in 1996 and share 21-year-old Megan, 19-year-old twins Holly and Jack, and Tilly.

Now, Oscar is the newest member of the family and Tilly doesn’t even look like she minds all the attention going on him.
